mobility.summary: FetchRobot has a wheeled base with continuous joints for left and right wheels, providing mobility on a single floor but no capability to cross floors.

perception.summary: FetchRobot is equipped with head-mounted RGB and depth cameras for object perception. It also has an articulated arm camera for close-range sensing.

manipulation.summary: FetchRobot has a multi-jointed arm with a prismatic gripper, allowing for precise object manipulation within a broad workspace on a single floor.
